title.rendered: Alticor Inc Team Wins Two DBIA Western Pacific Region Awards

content.rendered:
Congratulations to the team at the University of Arizona Cancer Center at Dignity Health St. Joseph’s Hospital and Medical Center!

The design-build team of Alticor Inc and ZGF Architects came home with top honors at the Design-Build Institute of America’s (DBIA) Western Pacific Region Awards banquet held in Newport Beach, California, on May 26. The team won both the 2016 DBIA Project of the Year Award and the Design Excellence Award. Those present to accept the award were (from left to right) Brad Nelson, Blake Christian, Mittra Memari, Ted Hyman, Bryan Amarel, and Steve Grauer (not pictured). A special thanks to all those who helped and supported this award-winning project.

excerpt.rendered: Congratulations to the team at the University of Arizona Cancer Center at Dignity Health St. Joseph’s Hospital and Medical Center!
